Intro: Tata Chem rose 2.3 rupees to close at 976 for the long weekend? Should you buy?
Sum:
Tata Chemicals has a moderate P/E, a great price target, good moving averages, a good RSI. Even though it has low returns, this stock should be a good asset in your portfolio.
HDFC Bank Q4 was good with profit growth topping 20%, but it still missed estimates. Also, Infosys missed its estimates. This may result in the Market dropping tomorrow.
Title: Should you buy Tata Chem? Sensex to drop tomorrow, TI analyses.
